The game’s standout feature is its 'bouncing bullet' physics—every shot you fire ricochets off the walls, meaning a missed shot could easily loop back to destroy your own tank. Supporting up to three players locally, it's a test of reflexes and spatial awareness. You'll navigate tight corridors while hunting for game-changing power-ups like heat-seeking missiles, high-powered lasers, and chaotic frag bombs. With its minimalist art style and instant-respawn action, it provides the perfect balance of competitive strategy and accidental hilarity for friends or solo play against the clever 'Laika' AI.

Vex 5 takes the legendary stickman parkour series to new heights with even more intricate level designs and punishing obstacles. As a test of pure platforming skill, you must run, jump, slide, and swim through a gauntlet of spinning saw blades, falling spikes, and high-speed zip lines. This installment introduces the 'Challenge Room,' a grueling series of 30 levels designed to push even Vex veterans to their breaking point. The game rewards momentum and precision; mastering the wall-jump and timing your slides is essential to earning those elusive gold trophies. With its clean graphics and responsive physics, Vex 5 is a 'just one more try' experience that satisfies the speedrunner in everyone.
W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys: Move/Jump/Slide; R: Restart Level

Panda Bubble Shooter is a charming and addictive twist on the classic match-3 bubble popping genre. In this vibrant adventure, you join a heroic papa panda on a quest to rescue his trapped cubs hidden within colorful bubbles. The game challenges your precision and tactical thinking as you aim and bounce bubbles off walls to create groups of three or more of the same color. As you progress through hundreds of levels, you'll encounter unique obstacles and unlock powerful boosters like fireballs and color-match rainbows. With its relaxing forest-themed visuals and satisfying physics-based gameplay, it is the perfect title for players looking for a mix of casual fun and strategic puzzle-solving.

Terris is a fast-paced, modern tribute to the world’s most famous block-stacking puzzle game. The goal is simple yet infinitely challenging: arrange falling geometric shapes (Tetriminos) to create solid horizontal lines. Once a line is completed, it vanishes, earning you points and preventing the screen from filling up. As your score increases, the speed of the falling blocks intensifies, requiring lightning-fast reflexes and spatial awareness. This version features clean, minimalist graphics and smooth animations, making it an excellent choice for both casual play and high-score chasing. Whether you're a veteran player looking to practice your 'T-spin' techniques or a newcomer, Terris delivers a timeless arcade experience.
